1: לִבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the sons</n> קֹ֭רַח <sup>7141 </sup> <n>of Korah</n> מִזְמ֣וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> שִׁ֑יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>[or] Song</n> יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <sup>3248 </sup> <n>His foundation</n> בְּהַרְרֵי־ <sup>2042 </sup> <n>mountains</n> קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>[is] in the holy</n>
2: אֹהֵ֣ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>loveth</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <sup>8179 </sup> <n>the gates</n> צִיּ֑וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <sup>4908 </sup> <n>more than all the dwellings</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
3: נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <sup>3513 </sup> <n>Glorious things</n> מְדֻבָּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>are spoken</n> בָּ֑ךְ עִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of thee O city</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
4: אַזְכִּ֤יר ׀ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>I will make mention</n> רַ֥הַב <sup>7294 </sup> <n>of Rahab</n> וּבָבֶ֗ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>and Babylon</n> לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <sup>3045 </sup> <n>to them that know</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>6429 </sup> <n>me behold Philistia</n> וְצ֣וֹר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>and Tyre</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כּ֑וּשׁ <sup>3568 </sup> <n>with Ethiopia</n> זֶ֝֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> יֻלַּד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>this [man] was born</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>But</n>
5: וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן ׀ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>And of Zion</n> יֵאָמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>it shall be said</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>This and that man</n> וְ֭אִישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> יֻלַּד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>was born</n> בָּ֑הּ וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>himself shall establish</n> עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <sup>5945 </sup> <n>in her and the highest</n>
6: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִ֭סְפֹּר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>shall count</n> בִּכְת֣וֹב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>when he writeth up</n> עַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> זֶ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> יֻלַּד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that] this [man] was born</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>there Selah</n>
7: וְשָׁרִ֥ים <sup>7891 </sup> <n>As well the singers</n> כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <sup>2490 </sup> <n>as the players</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> מַעְיָנַ֥י <sup>4599 </sup> <n>on instruments [shall be there] all my springs</n> בָּֽךְ׃
